about_the_game:
This content features an additional BGM pack with BGM tracks of past GUST titles.
Titles included:
- Atelier Lydie & Suelle
- BLUE REFLECTION
- Nights of Azure
- Nights of Azure 2

Note: This product is included in the Season Pass Lulua. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
detailed_description:
This content features an additional BGM pack with BGM tracks of past GUST titles.
Titles included:
- Atelier Lydie & Suelle
- BLUE REFLECTION
- Nights of Azure
- Nights of Azure 2

Note: This product is included in the Season Pass Lulua. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 or better, Graphic Memory 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3.4GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better, Graphic memory 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
